languages.text: Arbitrator's attacks made while it isn't their turn (and isn't their bonus turn) deal an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% and Immobilize the target for 1 round unless it succeeds on a Willpower Resistance Check.

traits.locale_text: If a shield is equipped, the Arbitrator is immune to Traumas in combat.

languages.text: The Arbitrator's attacks made on others' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% more damage. The target of such an attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Атаки арбитра, совершенные не в его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% больше урона. Цель такой атаки выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженной{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Arbitrator's attacks made while it is not their turn (and not their extra turn) deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% more damage. The target of such an attack must pass a Willpower resistance test or become immobilised for 1 round.

The Arbitrator's attacks made on others' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% more damage. The target of such an attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

The target of such an attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Arbitrator's attacks made while it isn't their turn (and isn't their bonus turn) deal an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% and Immobilize the target for 1 round unless it succeeds on a Willpower Resistance Check.

languages.text: Yargıcı'nın diğerlerinin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında yaptığı saldırılar, +%{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98} daha fazla hasar verir. Böyle bir saldırının hedefi, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator's attacks made on others' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% more damage. The target of such an attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı'nın diğerlerinin turu esnasında yaptığı saldırılar, +%{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98} daha fazla hasar verir. Böyle bir saldırının hedefi, İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olur. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.

Yargıcı'nın diğerlerinin turu esnasında yaptığı saldırılar, +%{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98} daha fazla hasar verir. Böyle bir saldırının hedefi, İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olur. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.

languages.text: Los ataques efectuados por el Arbitrator en {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} ajenos infligen un +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98} % más de daño. El objetivo de uno de estos ataques debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator's attacks made on others' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% more damage. The target of such an attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques efectuados por el Arbitrator en turnos ajenos infligen un +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98} % más de daño. El objetivo de uno de estos ataques debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad para no quedar inmovilizado durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: 法务官在其他角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内进行攻击时，造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}%。被法务官通过此类攻击命中的需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator's attacks made on others' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% more damage. The target of such an attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 法务官在其他角色的回合内进行攻击时，造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}%。被法务官通过此类攻击命中的需要进行意志抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入定身状态，持续一轮。

languages.text: Les attaques de l'arbitrator portées pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} d'autres personnages infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98} % de dégâts. Les cibles touchées par ces attaques doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, sans quoi elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator's attacks made on others' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% more damage. The target of such an attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques de l'arbitrator portées pendant le tour d'autres personnages infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98} % de dégâts. Les cibles touchées par ces attaques doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale, sans quoi elles sont immobilisées pendant 1 round.

languages.text: アービトレイターが相手{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中の攻撃は、ダメージが{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}%増加する。その攻撃を受けたターゲットは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator's attacks made on others' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% more damage. The target of such an attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターが相手ターン中の攻撃は、ダメージが{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}%増加する。その攻撃を受けたターゲットは、意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間移動不可になる。
アービトレイターが相手ターン中の攻撃は、ダメージが{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}%増加する。その攻撃を受けたターゲットは、意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間移動不可になる。

languages.text: Die Angriffe des Arbitrators außerhalb seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} verursachen +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98} % mehr Schaden. Das Ziel eines solchen Angriffs muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden.

The target of such an attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Angriffe des Arbitrators außerhalb seines Zuges verursachen +{uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98} % mehr Schaden. Das Ziel eines solchen Angriffs muss eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang gelähmt zu werden.

traits.locale_text: Атаки арбитра, совершенные не в его ход, наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|3b54a01fdbcb4031a47fab20f93a3a98}% больше урона. Цель такой атаки выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление и в случае провала оказывается обездвиженной на 1 раунд.
